# The `BalancedPartitioningConfig` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Algorithm parameters; default values are tuned on real-world binaries. <a href="#details">More...</a>

Recursive subtasks up to the given depth are added to the queue and distributed among threads by ThreadPool; all subsequent calls are executed on the same thread. <a href="#abbb5f17251e59b20bc5aa876f7c60e0f">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

## Description {#details}

Algorithm parameters; default values are tuned on real-world binaries.

### TaskSplitDepth {#abbb5f17251e59b20bc5aa876f7c60e0f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::BalancedPartitioningConfig::TaskSplitDepth = 9">
Recursive subtasks up to the given depth are added to the queue and distributed among threads by ThreadPool; all subsequent calls are executed on the same thread.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/balancedpartitioning-h/#l00097">97</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/balancedpartitioning-h">BalancedPartitioning.h</a>.
